nodes.text: Hes Glillto was the alias that Lai Nootka used when he entered the Coruscant system prior to the liberation of Coruscant. Like Nootka's other aliases, he created it by mixing and matching the first and last names of characters that appeared in a series of Durosian young-adult novels. During the last days of the trial of Tycho Celchu, Imperial Intelligence agent Kirtan Loor used the alias to make contact with Celchu's lawyer, Nawara Ven.
